name: Village pixel art - RPG asset pack
name_original: Village pixel art - RPG asset pack
description:
Presenting a new set of cute hand-crafted pixel assets for your RPG needs. This pack contains everything you need to start your first game project: Grass, water, roads, trees, flowers, cozy houses, friendly NPC.
  • A complete set of grass tiles (16x16 pixels), including vegetation, hills, coastlines, sandy trails, roads.
  • Houses, wells, fences, crops, stalls.
  • Products sold: fruits, berries, vegetables. all this is already placed in the boxes.
  • External objects such as flowers, house signs, fences, lanterns, and much more!
  • 1 Character (witch) NPC with animation of inactivity, walking, attack, death, taking damage (4 sides).
  • For comfort and variety, there are animals in the pack: a cat (white and red colors) with animation inactivity, walking, sleep, death (4 sides), duck with 1 animation: swimming (2 animations right and left) and another animal surprise.
  • The package includes a variety of agricultural vegetable beds and growth processes. vegetables that are included in the pack: beets, carrots, cabbage, tomatoes. you can sell them on the market. 
License : You can use this package in both commercial and non-commercial projects, just don't forget to add a link to my itch page. You cannot distribute it as is or resell it elsewhere. Feel free to send me messages on specific cases. Thanks! Purposes:
  • $10 : I'm adding an update to the "night version of the pack"
  • $30 : adding 10 new tiles.
  • $40: I add 20 different decorations.
  • $55 : adding 5 pets with animations in 4 directions
  • $70: adding 3 characters (civilians) 2 monsters. with animations in 4 directions.
  • $100: I'm starting to develop another pack with a large set of animal and character scenery tiles.
Download All sprites are supplied in PNG format. Assets are divided into folders:
  • (Animations, it includes: animations of a witch, a cat, a duck, a mailbox, a sign on the door and a surprise animal), 
  • separately PNG with tiles,
  •  decorations,
  •  houses, 
  • retail outlets
  •  agricultural land selling goods.
The free download includes:
  •  a grass tile (dark and light grass) +1 tree,
  •  +1 bush,
  •  +1 plate with decorative grass,
  •  +2 tiles with stones, 
  • +1 fruit
  • +2 boxes,
  •  +1 fruit box,
  •  +1 player's house,
  •  +1 duck with animation (swimming right to left),
  •  +1 flower,
  •  carrot cultures of 3 stages of growth and a box with carrots.
